item.title: Dockerizing Phoenix
item.description: As I dabble more and more with Elixir and Phoenix, I was looking into an efficient way to dockerize Phoenix applications. Although they are not totally incompatible in practice, using Docker makes sense if you don’t rely on hot code upgrades. I wanted my containers to use a base Alpine image and Distillery releases to be as lightweight as possible. I ended up leveraging multi-stage builds to write my Dockerfile. It uses three different stages.
